items.question_en: A legend claimed that after Jesus ascended a mountain near this body of water he looked out and said “beyond [it] there [is] nothing.” A folk song dedicated to this body of water refers to it as a “glorious sea” and makes a reference to the winds that arise in the Barguzin range near it. The nerpa is a species of seal that is endemic to this body of water. Submersibles from the Mir program conducted geological studies of this body of water, which forms the western border of Buryatia in Siberia. For the point, name this deepest lake on Earth, which is found in Russia.
items.question_zh: 有传说称，耶稣登上一座靠近该水体的山并远眺后说“在它之外再无他物”。一首献给该水体的民歌称其为“光辉之海”，并提到巴尔古津山脉吹来的风。涅尔帕海豹是该水体特有物种。米尔深潜器项目曾在这里进行地质研究。该水体位于西伯利亚，构成布里亚特共和国西部边界。问：这是俄罗斯境内、地球最深的湖泊叫什么？

items.question_en: A field named for showing this characteristic contains a popular windsurfing destination in its country known as Lake Cerknika. The Skocjan Caves form a UNESCO world heritage site that demonstrates the contact form of this phenomenon. This phenomenon also names a region extending to the Gulf of Trieste in the northern Adriatic. A plateau that is named for its exhibition of this phenomenon extends through Slovenia. This phenomenon can develop when rocks like dolomite or limestone dissolve. Sinkholes are a common feature of, for the point, what German- named type of topography?
items.question_zh: 一个展示这种地貌特征的地区里，有该国著名风帆运动地采尔克尼察湖。什科茨扬溶洞是联合国世界遗产，体现了这种地貌的接触类型。这一术语也用于指向亚得里亚海北部的里雅斯特湾一带地区。以该现象命名的高原延伸穿过斯洛文尼亚。当地貌中白云岩或石灰岩溶解时，常会形成这种现象。问：天坑常见于哪种由德语命名的地形类型？

items.question_en: Large float parades are held on this country’s holiday of Mashramani. This country’s Cuyuni- Mazaruni region is home to the large Omai gold mine while the mining of the aluminum ore bauxite drives the economy of this country’s city of Linden. This country’s flag depicts a red triangle inside a yellow triangle against a green background with the two triangles having black and white fimbriations respectively. The Essequibo River flows through this nation that is the only English-speaking country in South America. Suriname is to the east of, for the point, what country with capital at Georgetown.
items.question_zh: 这个国家在 Mashramani 节日会举行大型花车游行。该国库尤尼-马扎鲁尼地区有大型奥迈金矿，其林登市经济受铝土矿开采驱动。该国国旗为绿色底，上有黄色三角与红色内三角，并分别配以白黑边饰。埃塞奎博河流经该国；它是南美洲唯一以英语为官方语言的国家。问：位于苏里南以西、首都为乔治敦的是哪个国家？

items.question_en: This national park is the central subject of Donald Finkel’s poetry collection titled Answer Back. Spanning over 50,000 acres, the majority of this national park is found in Edmonson County. The Great Onyx is a feature within this national park that has been linked to the Flint Ridge system. The Green River flows through this national park that is within fifty miles of Bowling Green. Despite its name, this park has never shown evidence of containing the remains of the “wooly” species of its namesake mammal. For the point, name this Kentucky national park containing the longest cave system on Earth.
items.question_zh: 这个国家公园是唐纳德·芬克尔诗集《Answer Back》的核心主题。公园面积超过5万英亩，多数位于埃德蒙森县。其“大缟玛瑙洞”与燧石岭洞穴系统相连。格林河流经该公园，距离鲍灵格林不足50英里。尽管名字如此，该公园从未发现其同名“长毛物种”哺乳动物遗骸。问：这个位于肯塔基、拥有地球最长洞穴系统的国家公园叫什么？

items.question_en: Maria Finucci spelled out the word “HELP” in a UNESCO-backed art installation that is meant to create awareness about this region. Project Kaisei is a Japanese program focusing on this region which Charles J. Moore supposedly discovered this region on his way back from a yacht race. This region can be found in a gyre bound by the latitude lines of 0 and 50 degrees north. This region composes up to 8% of the ocean in which it is found and roughly 10% of fish species in this region are found to have plastic in them. For the point, name this large oceanic garbage patch.
items.question_zh: 玛丽亚·菲努奇曾在一项联合国教科文组织支持的艺术装置中拼出“HELP”，以提高对该区域的关注。日本的 Project Kaisei 聚焦该区域；据称查尔斯·J·摩尔在一次帆船赛返航途中发现了它。该区域位于一个环流中，大致处在北纬0至50度之间。它占其所在海洋面积最高可达8%，并且该区域约10%的鱼类体内发现塑料。问：这片大型海洋垃圾带叫什么？
